headline: Show HN: I made a small Space Shooter
description:
Thank you https://opengameart.org for your service. People like me who can't draw or compose music are in your debt.

The game, "Glitch and Rush" has been made in a few hours here and there.

I've been tinkering in GameDev for years, if not decades, but I never released anything. The goal here was simple:

  - come up with a core mechanic
  - implement a single level
  - add some polishing
  - RELEASE
I hope you'll enjoy it. BTW, my best time is 2min23s (yes, I'm bad at my own game, it's ok, I'm ok).
